name: Beatbox Sausages
description:
• You like this Game?
  • You want me to do more of them?
  • You are a wiener?
  • You have a wiener?
  • You're just happy to be here?

So share this game! Put it everywhere you like!

And buy me a beer to continue to make stupid games!

(You are AWESOME and I'm very thankful if you decide to do so :))


Description

Take the control of 10 beatbox sausages in the quest for the mega-party!

  • Start with a boring empty fridge
  • Unlock new sausages and tracks
  • Beatbox the s*** out of them
  • UNLEASH THE MEGA-PARTY!

Controls

  • Keypad (0-9)
  • Keys (0-9)
  • Mouse

PLAY THE WAY YOU WANT, INVITE FRIENDS AND BEATBOX TOGETHER ON THE SAME COMPUTER!


Credits

A game by:

  • Nicolas Kraj

Tracks by:

  • Eleven Thoughts Beats
  • CJ Beats
  • Kevin MacLeod

Beatbox by:

  • SzcZ
